title: Taiwan Liposome PhI/II trial on acupuncture-type arthritis candidate fully enrolled
author: EJ Lane
description: Taiwan Liposome has achieved full enrollment for its 12-week Phase I/II candidate to treat arthritis, TLC599, a therapy administered akin to acupuncture through a microneedle that enables it to pen | Taiwan Liposome has achieved full enrollment for its 12-week Phase I/II candidate to treat arthritis, TLC599, a therapy administered akin to acupuncture through a microneedle that enables it to penetrate small joints.
